content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER
content.text:
The PRESIDING OFFICER. Under the previous order, the Senate will be 
in a period of morning business, with Senators permitted to speak 
therein for up to 10 minutes each.

content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER
content.text: The PRESIDING OFFICER. The Senator from Iowa.

content.speaker: Mr. GRASSLEY
content.text: Mr. GRASSLEY. I ask unanimous consent to speak for 1 minute.

content.speaker: The PRESIDING OFFICER
content.text: The PRESIDING OFFICER. Without objection, it is so ordered.
